title: Quality management system for providers of high-risk AI systems

article_refs.quote: have a quality management system in place which complies with Article 17;
Providers of high-risk AI systems shall put a quality management system in place that ensures compliance with this Regulation.

legal_consequence.verbatim: Providers of high-risk AI systems shall put a quality management system in place that ensures compliance with this Regulation (Article 17).

question.prompt: Does Art. 2 scope apply and no exclusion?

sources.quote: ‘provider’ means a natural or legal person...

question.prompt: Is the actor a provider per Art. 3(2)?
question.help: Develops or has developed AI system/model and places/puts into service under own name/mark.

question.prompt: Is the AI system high-risk under Art. 6?

nodes.label: Not product-safety carve-out (Art. 2(2))
nodes.notes: For Annex I Section B product pathway under Art. 6(1), Chapter III obligations may not apply per Art. 2(2).

sources.quote: only Article 6(1), Articles 102 to 109 and Article 112 apply
